DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate low cost minimal stimulation protocol combine Intravaginal Culturing , make IVF affordable available across large infertile/subfertile population
DOC.brief_title: Minimal Stimulation Protocol Using Aromek ( Letrozole ) Follitrope ( recFSH ) Combined With INVOCell-Low Cost IVF
DOC.detailed_description: In routine ART procedure IVF , ovarian stimulation perform use regulation GNRH Agonist combine high daily FSH dose follow ovulation induction HCG 10000 IU , ovum pick-up 34-36 hour HCG injection embryo transfer day 2 , 3 5 . In routine ART procedure IVF , embryology do high tech lab , contamination free environment , also exclude VOC , high quality CO2 Incubators , laminar flow heat table top , high magnification stereo microscope along equipment maintain quality control , highly trained embryologist . The primary reason need create womb like environment embryology lab egg , mainly fertilise embryo go spend minimum 2 3 case blastocyst 5 day lab . In recent year , various study publish identify various minimal stimulation protocol IVF , also another variation IVF rather use CO2 Incubator culturing , vaginal cavity female partner use incubation use specially design capsule wall permeable vaginal pCO2 O2 . Oocytes retrieved physician hand basic embryologist identify grade oocyte wash sperm place embryo toxic test , sterile , individual single use capsule ( INVOCell ) place vaginal cavity use diaphragm , patient go back home instruction care , day 2 patient come back IVF Clinic physician get capsule hand basic embryologist train INVOCell identify embryos grade , load embryos ET Catheter .
